record.description: iPhone 6 Plus isn’t simply bigger — it’s better in every way. Larger, yet dramatically thinner. More powerful, but remarkably power efficient. With a smooth metal surface that seamlessly meets the new Retina HD display. It’s one continuous form where hardware and software function in perfect unison, creating a new generation of iPhone that’s better by any measure.
record.name: Apple iPhone 6 Plus
record.options: <form ignoreDvd="false"><select id="country" label="Select your country" mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" style="combo" visible="true" visibleResult="true"><option label=""/><option label="Germany [+$20.00]">DE</option><option label="France [+$50.00]">FR</option><option label="The Netherlands [+$10.00]">NL</option><option label="Belgium">BE</option></select><select id="color" label="Choose your color" mandatory="false" mandatoryResult="false" style="radio" visible="(~substr([country],1) isin {"FR","BE"})" visibleResult="true"><option id="0" label="Gold [+$10.00]">gold</option><option id="1" label="Silver [+$5.00]">silver</option><option id="2" label="Grey">grey</option></select></form>

record.option.costs: <costs><selectnode id="country"><option costadj="20" label="Germany">DE</option><option costadj="50" label="France">FR</option><option costadj="10" label="The Netherlands">NL</option><option costadj="0" label="Belgium">BE</option></selectnode><selectnode id="color"><option costadj="10" label="Gold">gold</option><option costadj="5" label="Silver">silver</option><option costadj="0" label="Grey">grey</option></selectnode></costs>
record.detailedDescription: iPhone 6 Plus isn’t simply bigger — it’s better in every way. Larger, yet dramatically thinner. More powerful, but remarkably power efficient. With a smooth metal surface that seamlessly meets the new Retina HD display. It’s one continuous form where hardware and software function in perfect unison, creating a new generation of iPhone that’s better by any measure.
